altername_name: Nickelodeon SpongeBob SquarePants and Friends Unite!
SpongeBob und Freunde: Durch dick und dünn!
name: Nicktoons Unite!
overview: SpongeBob, Jimmy, Timmy and Danny must combine their powers to defeat the Evil Syndicate and destroy the devastating Doomsday device. It's good vs. evil where only one team of Nicktoons will prevail.
